title: What?
description: What? tells the story of Curious Cat, who is tired of eating the same thing for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. The questions he asks will be familiar to early readers. The repetitive sentence pattern is supported by engaging illustrations.
reviewWords: breakfast, curious, dinner, fish, lunch, pizza, please, snack
awareness: Blend Phonemes                : Blend onset and rime
grammar: Capitalization and Punctuation                : Capitalize sentence beginnings and punctuate sentence endings
